name: Letterkenny Chamber of Commerce
goal:
Letterkenny Chamber is the premier business membership organisation in Donegal and works for the interests of the business community while also promoting economic development in the region with a range of partners and key stakeholders.
Letterkenny Chamber is in Business for Business acting as a voice for itâ€™s members and the wider business community.
interests: Borders and Security, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market
euInitiatives: Main area of concern in terms of the EU is around Brexit. Due to the proximity of the border our members are concerned about traiffs, movement of people and the status of goods and services across the seamless border once the UK leaves the EU.
